examples: She suffered a fracture in the accident
He had an insulin shock after eating three candy bars
She got a bruise on her leg
He got his arm broken in the scuffle
Every time her husband gets drunk, she suffers

definitions.text: put up with something or somebody unpleasant
examples: I cannot bear his constant criticism
The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks
he learned to tolerate the heat
She stuck out two years in a miserable marriage

definitions.text: feel pain or be in pain

examples: Were you hurting after the accident?
She is suffering from the hot weather
She suffers from a tendency to talk too much
This author really suffers in translation
